meanings.definition: Of or relating to the point in the orbit of the moon or a satellite at which it is nearest to the earth.
meanings.sent1: The perigean moon appeared larger in the sky.
meanings.sent2: During the perigean phase, the satellite is closest to Earth.
meanings.sent3: The perigean satellite waved hello to the earth as it passed by.
meanings.sent4: The perigean orbit hugged the earth closely.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the perigean moon's proximity to our planet.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the time when the moon or a satellite is at its closest point to the earth.
meanings.sent1: We observed the perigean satellite through a telescope.
meanings.sent2: The perigean moment is when the moon is nearest to Earth.
meanings.sent3: The perigean moon whispered secrets to the earth below.
meanings.sent4: The perigean connection between the moon and earth was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The perigean event brought astronomers from all over to witness the closeness of the moon.
